articles.content: A code savvy fan of the seminal video game Grand Theft Auto V has come up with a fix for one of its most frustrating flaws, and they did such a good job the game developers want to roll out their fix… [+3207 chars]

articles.title: Use of artificial intelligence to tackle coronavirus must go through ethical checks, say experts - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Rapid deployment of artificial intelligence and machine learning to tackle coronavirus must still go through ethical checks and balances, or we risk harming already disadvantaged communities in the rush to defeat the disease.
